components.text: <li><b>$(t:In which Dimensions can the Ore be found?)Dimension:</><li2>#dim#<li><b>$(t:At which Y-Level can the Ore be found?)y-Level:</><li2>#yMin# - #yMax#<li><b>$(t:How large are the Ore veins?)Clustersize:</><li2>#cSize#<li><b>$(t:How many veins are there per chunk?)Clustercount:</><li2>#cCount#
